dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 2375 IH: Rhode Island Fishermen’s Fairness Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Magaziner (for himself and Mr. Amo) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Magnuson-Stevens Fishery Conservation and Management Act to add Rhode Island to the Mid-Atlantic Fishery Management Council.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Rhode Island Fishermen’s Fairness Act of 2025.

section.header: Addition of Rhode Island to the Mid-Atlantic Fishery Management Council
section.text: Section 302(a)(1)(B) of the Magnuson-Stevens Fishery Conservation and Management Act (16 U.S.C. 1852(a)(1)(B)) is amended—

paragraph.text: by inserting Rhode Island, after States of;
by inserting Rhode Island, after except North Carolina,;
